StuffTheSpire:Synthwave.DESCRIPTION: Lightning triggers it's passive an additional time.

StuffTheSpire:LoadUp.NAME: Overload

StuffTheSpire:Slingshot.NAME: Slingshot
StuffTheSpire:Slingshot.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

StuffTheSpire:RockThrow.NAME: Rock Throw
StuffTheSpire:RockThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Draw 1 card. NL If this card is exhausted add a copy of this card to your hand next turn. It costs 0 for the rest of combat.
StuffTheSpire:RockThrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Draw 1 card. NL If this card is exhausted add !M! copies of this card to your hand next turn. They cost 0 for the rest of combat.

StuffTheSpire:RagingBull.NAME: Raging Bull

StuffTheSpire:SnapShoot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have at least 3 orbs channeled, permanently add an upgraded stuffthespire:Snapshot that channels your 3 front most orbs to your deck. NL Fleeting.

StuffTheSpire:Incursion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 stuffthespire:Dark_Fade. When you loose HP, loose twice as much for !M! turn. NL Exhaust.
